column4: i am using the "Creat Partition" tool that comes of part of the install wizard. its asking me for a mount point, but where is this info stored. if i select the parition to be "/" root how does ubuntu know at next boot time that this is what i have choosen? is it stored in a file like fstab i am looking for a deeper understanding of how this works
yes it goes into fstab when you do the install
thanks. that was lots easyer than i though it was going to be haha
if youre trying to modify an existing install not do a new one, then you need to change the fstab on that disk
and in that case, gparted or fdisk is what you ought to use instead of the partitioner
